title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description:
When modifying parameters in the 'Modify Parameters' dialog, there are a few issues that need to be addressed:

i. The duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page.
ii. The first and second columns in the dialog could be merged.
OB:
- The buttons in the dialog are too small.
- When the dialog opens, no table entry is selected.
- Both move buttons are enabled even when there is no selected item.
- When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.
- The dialog becomes extremely large for methods with many parameters.
EB:
- The marking between the top button and the list is too large.
- The top button should be aligned with the top of the dialog.
- The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic.
- Multiple selection should be allowed, as the move up/down functionality can be applied to more than one item.
- The signature preview must be a label that wraps text.
- It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover.
